title: 2 teenagers arrested in connection to fatal shooting of 15-year-old Queens girl
content:
FAR ROCKAWAY, Queens — Police have arrested two teenagers in connection with the fatal shooting of a 15-year-old Queens girl.
Police say they were alerted to a shooting inside 22-04 Collier Avenue at 12:03 a.m. Friday.
They say they found Wilta Wordsworth, 15, shot in the head inside the apartment.
EMS took her to St. Johns Hospital where she died Saturday morning.
Two 15-year-old males were arrested and charged with manslaughter, criminal possession of a weapon and tampering with physical evidence.
